name: NXT Image File
summary: Learn about .RIC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: By default, the NXT-G programming environment displays the first sprite sheet in a program. Display parameters can be modified using .NXC program files.
NOTE: LEGO MINDSTORMS NXT "evolved" into LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 in 2013.

description: Image format used for displaying images on the LEGO Mindstorms NXT brick, the "brain" of an NXT robot; may include multiple sprite sheets, CopyBits, VarMaps, parameters, and other data.
